topic: Examination in B.Sc. Computer Science and Master Computer Science

correspondence.message: Can I retake an exam in the Master's in Computer Science that I have already passed in the B.Sc. in Computer Science but which I did not take as an elective module if I do not apply for recognition of this exam in the Master's?"
Yes, that is basically possible. Why don't you want to apply for recognition? You have already invested time and energy in the subject and exam preparation."
I do not want to make this request because the subject would allow me to gain more ECTS and I only just passed the original exam. I will decide this semester whether I want to take the exam."
Consider whether you can take the exam this semester. Please note that the subject can no longer be recognized if you were registered for the exam and did not pass.
